#include<stdio.h>
#define mod 1009
int power(int base, int expo)
{
    if(expo==0)
    return 1;

    if(expo==1)
    return base;

        int t;
        t= power(base,expo/2);
        t= (((t%mod)*(t%mod))%mod);
        t= ((t)*(power(base,expo%2)%mod))%mod;
        return t;
}
/*
int main()
{
    int x = 2;
    int y = 3;

    printf("%d", power(x, y));
    getchar();
    return 0;
}
*/
int main()
{
    int t,i;
    unsigned long long n,k;
    int fact[1010],factinv[1010],p=1,q=1;
    fact[0]=factinv[0]=1;
    for(i=1;i<=1009;i++)
    {
        p*=i;
        p%=mod;
        fact[i]=p;

        q*=power(i,1007);
        q%=1009;
        factinv[i]=q;
    }
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int result=1,N,K;
        scanf("%llu %llu",&n,&k);
        while(n)
        {
            N=n%1009;
            K=k%1009;
            if(N<K)
            {
                result=0;
                break;
            }
            result*= (fact[N]*factinv[K]*factinv[N-K])%mod;
            result%=mod;
            n=n/mod;
            k=k/mod;
        }
        printf("%d\n",result);

    }
    return 0;
}
